source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT  L.UID AS UniqueSiteID, L.Account_x0020_Status_ AS [Account Status_], L.Account_x0020_Name_ AS [Account Name_], L.NAPA_x0020_Region_ AS [NAPA Region_]
FROM    SHAREPOINT_PROD.dbo.MNF_ACCOUNT AS L LEFT OUTER JOIN
Active_Directory.dbo.AD_User_Object AS A01 ON A01.GivenName + ' ' + A01.LastName = L.RVP_x0020__x002d__x0020_Business_ AND A01.Enabled = '1' LEFT OUTER JOIN
Active_Directory.dbo.AD_User_Object AS A02 ON A02.GivenName + ' ' + A02.LastName = L.Operations_x0020_Manager_ AND A02.Enabled = '1' LEFT OUTER JOIN
Active_Directory.dbo.AD_User_Object AS A03 ON A03.GivenName + ' ' + A03.LastName = L.RVP_x0020__x002d__x0020_Clinical_ AND A03.Enabled = '1' LEFT OUTER JOIN
Active_Directory.dbo.AD_User_Object AS A04 ON A04.GivenName + ' ' + A04.LastName = L.AVP_x0020__x002d__x0020_Clinical_ AND A04.Enabled = '1' LEFT OUTER JOIN
Active_Directory.dbo.AD_User_Object AS A05 ON A05.GivenName + ' ' + A05.LastName = L.Clinical_x0020_Director_ AND A05.Enabled = '1' LEFT OUTER JOIN
Active_Directory.dbo.AD_User_Object AS A06 ON A06.GivenName + ' ' + A06.LastName = L.Chief_ AND A06.Enabled = '1' LEFT OUTER JOIN
Active_Directory.dbo.AD_User_Object AS A07 ON A07.GivenName + ' ' + A07.LastName = L.Vice_x0020_Chief_ AND A07.Enabled = '1' LEFT OUTER JOIN
Active_Directory.dbo.AD_User_Object AS A08 ON A08.GivenName + ' ' + A08.LastName = L.Region_x0020_Chief_x0020_CRNA_ AND A08.Enabled = '1' LEFT OUTER JOIN
Active_Directory.dbo.AD_User_Object AS A09 ON A09.GivenName + ' ' + A09.LastName = L.Chief_x0020_CRNA_ AND A09.Enabled = '1' LEFT OUTER JOIN
Active_Directory.dbo.AD_User_Object AS A10 ON A10.GivenName + ' ' + A10.LastName = L.Assistant_x0020_Chief_x0020_CRNA_ AND A10.Enabled = '1' LEFT OUTER JOIN
Active_Directory.dbo.AD_User_Object AS A11 ON A11.GivenName + ' ' + A11.LastName = L.Quality_x0020_Champion_ AND A11.Enabled = '1' LEFT OUTER JOIN
Active_Directory.dbo.AD_User_Object AS A12 ON A12.GivenName + ' ' + A12.LastName = L.NAPA_x0020_Service_x0020_Champion AND A12.Enabled = '1' LEFT OUTER JOIN
pbi_gpms.dbo.biz_structure AS B ON L.UID = B.UniqueSiteId
WHERE  (L.Account_x0020_Status_ IN ('Active', 'Inactive')) AND (L.UID IS NOT NULL)
